entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
